response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $12,000. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. To make this opportunity even more appealing, I am willing to sell the product to you for $11,500. This represents a significant saving of $500 compared to the original value, making it a great deal for you. I believe this price reflects the quality and utility of the product while allowing us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 11500}
